message.name: ERR_ENT_AES_XML_SHARING_RULES_FV_NOT_VALID
message.locale: The XML sharing rules file %1s does not comply with the schema.

message.name: ERR_ENT_AES_XML_SHARING_RULES_FV_NOT_ATTACHED
message.locale: The XML sharing rules contained must be attached.

message.name: ERR_ENT_AES_XFV_LOGICALLY_EQUIVALENT_SHARING_EVIDENCE_THESAME
message.locale: For logically equivalent sharing, the source evidence type and target evidence type cannot be the same.
